title: Son-in-law of Burundian activist shot dead in capital
text:
Published By: Reuters - World news - Today 
NAIROBI (Reuters) - Unknown gunmen on Friday killed the son-in-law of a prominent Burundian human rights activist who openly opposed Preside...
